name: AIMDek Technologies
description:
AIMDek delivers strategy, consulting and outsourcing services in digital technologies to it’s customers around the world. We have been working hand-in-hand, with businesses & startups in solving problems by building digital products and solutions. We design, build and operate enterprise grade softwares with primary focus on performance, accuracy, user experience and maintainability.
 
With our expertise in technology and industry knowledge, we offer services on Enterprise Portal (EP), Enterprise Content Management (ECM), Electronic Health Records (EHR), Business Process Management (BPM),  Enterprise Application Integration (EAI), Business Intelligence (BI), Enterprise Mobility, Big Data, Data Analytics & Insights.
 
Having clients from various industries, we are specialised in Healthcare,Automotive, Manufacturing, eCommerce, Sports & Fitness, Education, Insurance and Banking industries.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 203, Shivam Complex, Science City Road, Sola,
